Description: Statue of a royal prince: the upper part of a naophorous or theophorous statue of a Ramesside prince wearing a short round wig with a sidelock. The back pillar is incised with titles. The head, shoulders and part of the upper arms are preserved. The beard is broken and the nose and upper part of the back pillar are damaged.
Curator's comments: Bibliography: V. Davies in 'The British Museum Society Bulletin' 23 (Nov. 1976), 21-2; J. Bourriau, 'Journal of Egyptian Archaeology' 64 (1978), 125 (no. 65); K.A. Kitchen, 'Ramesside Inscriptions' Vol. 7 (Oxford: Blackwell Press), 220; B. Porter & R. Moss, 'Topographical Bibliography of Ancient Egyptian Hieroglyphic Texts, Reliefs and Paintings' VIII (Oxford: Clarendon Press), 638; M.A. Corzo, 'Nefertari Luce d'Egitto' (Rome, 1994), p. 153 [25].
Bibliographic references: Bierbrier 1982 / Hieroglyphic texts from Egyptian stelae, etc., in the British Museum, Part 10. (pl.38-39)
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 2001 26 Jun-23 Sep, Birmingham Gas Hall, Egypt Revealed 2005-2006 22 Feb-29 May, London, The Jewish Museum, Passover 2016 8 Mar–12 Jun, Cleveland, Cleveland Museum of Art, Pharaoh: King of Egypt 2018 7 Jun–16 Sep, Barcelona, La Caixa, Pharaoh: King of Egypt 2018-2019 16 Oct–20 Jan, Madrid, La Caixa, Pharaoh: King of Egypt 2019 19 Feb–25 Aug, Girona, La Caixa, Pharaoh: King of Egypt 2019-2020 24 Sept–12 Jan, Seville, La Caixa, Pharaoh: King of Egypt 2020–2021 11 Feb–21 Feb, Tarragona, La Caixa, Pharaoh: King of Egypt 2021 25 Mar–15 Aug, Santiago de Compostela, Museo Centro de Gaias, Pharaoh King of Egypt 2021-2022 15 Sep–9 Jan, Zaragoza, La Caixa, Pharaoh: King of Egypt 2022 10 Feb–15 May, Palma, La Caixa, Pharaoh King of Egypt 2022-2023 21 Jun–26 Feb, Valencia, La Caixa, Pharaoh: King of Egypt 2023 29 Mar–23 Jul, Lleida, La Caixa, Pharaoh: King of Egypt
Condition: Incomplete. The head, shoulders and part of the upper arms are preserved. The beard is broken and the nose and upper part of the back pillar are damaged.
Associated names: Named in inscription & portrayed: Sety II (?)
